resources.string: Established in 1960, Fairview High School, home of the Knights, is located in beautiful south Boulder, Colorado. Recognized nationally for its excellence, we offer students a variety of rich academic pathways. With a variety of clubs, sports, technology, and arts programs, Fairview fosters a sense of community, supports diversity, and encourages all students to find their place and thrive.
